item.title: Cheese
item.description: You know how we have two pieces of cheese?

item.title: Strange Neighbour
item.description: I looked out the window and said to you, “look, Julie1 is walking up the driveway backwards, again”.

item.title: Seafood Pasta
item.description: We were all looking for something to eat.

item.title: Yellower Hair
item.description: So, we were with my family getting ready to go out and you were showing off your hair because you’d dyed it yellow. And even though you’re already blonde I thought it looked nice.

item.title: Credit Card
item.description: I dreamt that I went to the shops and then I went to pay and couldn’t find the card. But then I looked again, and it was behind another card.

item.title: Windex / Breaking Bad
item.description: We went away with Teams1 for the weekend. When we got home one of the mothers called, to tell me, to remind you, to be careful in the shower because she’d cleaned the tiles on the ground with Windex and it would be slippery.

item.title: Glassbox Chicken
item.description: I was eating chicken but it was cooked on sticks in this glass box thing so I don’t think that’s boring.

item.title: Rude Band
item.description:
Last night I dreamt that we were at the big house and I said “we went and saw a band last night” and Anth said, “who?” And I said, “they’re called a rude word” and you thought it was funny. Apparently I just dream stuff that might happen :p

Rude Band by Andrew

item.title: Gels
item.description: So at work at arts house they call the coloured cellophane covers for lights “gels”. So I dreamt that I was with gen at the Next Wave bump in, and there were these light globes filled with actual gel. And I thought, “huh, I guess that’s what they mean when they call them gels” and then I told gen that’s what they were as if I’d known all along

item.title: Accounting
item.description: I was trying to explain double-entry accounting to a young child who just didn’t get it. It was not a restful night.

item.title: Getting Married
item.description: Liv’s dream from last night: “so I was getting married to my brother, but we were in a synagogue so I’ll have to marry Andrew. Oh but I can’t marry Andrew because of Sam. Why can’t I marry Tristan? Oh yeah, because we’re in a synagogue. I guess I’ll marry Andrew. Oh but I can’t because of Sam…” the loop continues
